alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 6:19AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Houston, northeastern Jackson, north central Decatur, western Miller, northern Seminole and south central Early Counties through 745 AM EST/645 AM CST/... At 719 AM EST/619 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Donalsonville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Donalsonville, Iron City, Jakin, Steam Mill, Davis Park, Little Hope, Lela, Mayhaw, Killarney, Riverturn, Sharphagen, Donaldsonville A/P, Chattahoochee SP, Enterprise, Lucy and Hornsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/ for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 100 PM EST/noon CST/ for southwestern Georgia.
